resources.string: To begin, click the button below to analyse your call history.
The following are contacts with which you have the least registered calls. Select any you want to remove, or press \'Skip\'.
The following are numbers of those who have called you/have been called by you frequently, but are not contacts. Select any you want to add, or press \'Skip\'.
Add names for at least one contact (any numbers for which names have not been entered will not have contacts created).
